questions.question: which company has the best roe performance
questions.answer: Based on 93 historical records from 2016-2023, Almarai demonstrates the highest ROE performance, averaging 5.8% compared to Savola's 3.3% and NADEC's 1.3%. Almarai achieved a peak ROE of 16.0% during the analysis period.

questions.question: compare almarai vs savola for investment
questions.answer: Historical analysis shows Almarai outperforms Savola with ROE of 5.8% vs 3.3%. Almarai shows lower volatility at 4.2% vs 4.2%. Our AI models predict this trend to continue based on 93 historical data points with 89.5% prediction accuracy.

questions.question: portfolio optimization using historical data
questions.answer: Our portfolio optimizer uses correlation analysis from 93 historical records spanning 8 years. Based on actual ROE performance: Almarai (avg: 5.8%), Savola (avg: 3.3%), NADEC (avg: 1.3%). The AI models achieve 89.5% accuracy in investment recommendations.

questions.question: saudi food sector analysis
questions.answer: AI analysis of 93 quarterly records shows: Top performer Almarai (ROE: 5.8%), followed by Savola (3.3%) and NADEC (1.3%). Models trained on 8 years of data achieve 84.2% accuracy in company status classification.
